what: Execute Function Examples From Archived Package Sources
title: Execute Function Examples From Archived Package Sources
text: goal retrex make easy run examples archived package source current versions packages order test RETRocompatibility EXamples ultimately evaluate reproducibility code.

title: Execute Function Examples From Archived Package Sources
text: {retrex} available CRAN, can install development version retrex like :

title: Execute Function Examples From Archived Package Sources
text: basic example shows solve common problem:

text: sources_df Data frame. data frame returned `get_sources_for_selected_packages()` clean Boolean, defaults TRUE. TRUE, keeps man/ folder containing documentaton. FALSE, keeps entire package. test Boolean, defaults FALSE. TRUE useful running unit tests.

title: Downloads Rd from an archived source package — get_examples
code: if (FALSE) { # First, get list of packages. In this case, the ones in the "Econometrics" view as of "2015-01-01" ctv_econ <- get_packages_from_view("Econometrics", date = "2015-01-01")  # Now, get the names, versions, and urls for these packages ctv_econ_sources <- get_sources_for_selected_packages(ctv_econ)  # It is now possible to download the man/ folders of these packages with the following lines get_examples(ctv_econ_sources) }
